promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic rare butterfly psychic-type pokemon with ancient wings. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or butterfly. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Psychalith, a a gigantic rare butterfly psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Draining Blade, Psychic Lock. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "butterfly", "psychic" or "Psychalith". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, butterfly-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: In mystical caverns, this mystical lepidopteran dwells. Known for its Draining Blade and Psychic Lock abilities, it is a treasured rarity.
